description: Dividend safety rating based on Buffett's preference for sustainable cash returns
research_basis: Weights based on RATINGS_ARCHITECT.md specification (lines 549-552) and Buffett's investment philosophy. FCF coverage weighted highest (35%) as free cash flow sustainability is critical. Payout ratio second (30%) as indicator of dividend sustainability. Growth streak (20%) shows management commitment. Net cash (15%) provides cushion during downturns. Sources: RATINGS_ARCHITECT spec, Buffett shareholder letters on cash generation.

payout_ratio.notes: Lower payout ratio provides cushion to maintain dividends during downturns

fcf_coverage.description: Free cash flow / dividends paid ratio
fcf_coverage.notes: High FCF coverage indicates sustainable dividends backed by actual cash generation

growth_streak.notes: Long dividend growth streak shows management commitment to shareholder returns

net_cash.notes: Strong net cash position provides buffer to sustain dividends during economic downturns
